subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The last remaining African teams in the World Cup, Algeria and Nigeria, were eliminated on Monday, ensuring that the continent would once again remember the 2014 event for off-the-field squabbles.
snippet: The last remaining African teams in the World Cup, Algeria and Nigeria, were eliminated on Monday, ensuring that the continent would once again remember the 2014 event for off-the-field squabbles.
